title: Glasswall Halo
description: Glasswall Halo is built upon powerful cloud-native architecture using scalable Kubernetes. CDR technology removes potential threats from unknown files in less than a second, without compromising the files contents.

title: Glasswall Constellations
description: By integrating with Glasswall Halo, Constellations processes large file containers with unparalleled speed and efficiency. Efficiently processing a 1TB data container in less than one hour.

title: Glasswall Desktop
description: An Electron app supporting windows and mac OS. 'drag and drop files from the outside world into the Glasswall Embedded Engine'

title: jdmcserver
description: One project I started with a friend recently, jdmcserver, is a Minecraft server hosted in an AWS EC2 instance. As well as a static frontend and API hosted on AWS. The API connects Lambda functions, which toggle the running status of the EC2 instance, and expose the server's details.

title: This Website!
description: This CV is actually a React/Webpack static site.  I wanted to version-control the web pages for the CV, but also the content. I needed a way to quickly make a change and see it propogate instantly on the frontend. I decided to go with GitHub, in order to make it open. An added bonus is a free proof-read; if a friend or potential employer spots a mistake or wants to suggest an improvement, they can create a pull request on this repository! :)
